data.name: ContactUs
data.value: If you have any questions, please contact {0}

data.name: InitialMessage
data.value:
Hi✋
I'll help you connect with real language learners at your level and with similar interests to practice speaking skills in Google Meet.
Before we get started, I will ask you for some information.

data.name: LanguageLevelSet
data.value: Language level has been set to {0}

data.name: UserLeftMeetingTemplate
CreateMeetingTemplate
data.value: 🌍 {{ title }} 📌 Meeting #{{ meeting_id }} 🌐 Language: {{ language_name }} 🗒 Language level: {{ language_level }} 💬 Topic: {{ topic }} 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Max people number: {{ people_number }} 📅 Date: {{ date }} 🕑 Time: {{ time }} {{ time_zone }}

data.name: UserJoinedMeeting
LocationSet
data.value: Location has been successfully updated, your location is {0}, your timezone is {1}. You can always change your location by executing {2} command

data.name: UnableResolveLocation
data.value: Unable to resolve location, please, try later

data.name: CouldNotResolveLocation
data.value: Couldn't determine your location, try to specify your address in the following format: Country, City

data.name: CreateMeetingAskLocation
data.value: To make it possible to display meeting`s date and time in your timezone and show partners country, we need to know your location. Type your location in meetingChatMessage input in the following format: Country, City, for example: USA, New York

data.name: HelpFindPartner
data.value: I can help you find a partner for practicing languages. You can control me by sending these commands:

data.name: WhatWouldYouLikeToChange
data.value: What would you like to change?

data.name: ViewMeetingTemplate
data.value: 📌 Meeting #{{ meeting.id }} 📅 Date: {{ meeting.date }} 🕑 Time: {{ meeting.time }} {{ meeting.time_zone }} 🌐 Language: {{ meeting.language }} 🗒 Language level: {{ meeting.language_level }} {{if(meeting.topic_name == null)}}💬 Topic: Topic not selected{{else}}💬 Topic: {{ meeting.topic_name }}{{end}} 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Free{{meeting.max_participants_count - meeting.participants_count }} from {{ meeting.max_participants_count }} seats 🏞 Creator {{ meeting.user_id }} from {{ meeting.creator_country }}, {{ meeting.creator_gender }}

data.name: AuthorizeWithGoogle
data.value:
At Lingo Practices we automate processes to make the user experience as convenient as possible.
As a part of automation Lingo Practices auto-creates Google Meet meetings allowing partners to meet without having to set up on online meetings themselves.

data.name: AuthorizeWithGoogleSuccess
data.value:
Congrats!
Now you can create unlimited number of meetings to practice language!

data.name: AlreadyAuthorizedWithGoogle
data.value: You've already been authorized with Google

data.name: StartBotCommand
data.value: Execute {0} command to start the bot

data.name: ForgotToProvideCalendarPermissions
data.value:
Apparently you have not provided access to your calendar🤔
In order for us to create a Google Meet meetings on your behalf, we need access to your calendar.
Please log in again to grant access to the calendar😎

data.name: SomethingWentWrong
data.value: Something went wrong, we are already working on fixing this error. If the error persists, please contact {0}

data.name: NotPendingMeetings
data.value: You don't have any active meetings yet

data.name: CantJoinMeetingSameTime
data.value: ❌You can't join the meeting because you already have the meeting for that date and time❌

data.name: TitleTextTopicNameOnModerating
data.value:
Your topic is on moderating. After we review your topic you will receive notification about moderation result.
Usually it takes less than one business day

data.name: TitleTextTopicAlreadyExist
data.value: Topic with the same name already exist.

data.name: TitleTextTopicCreated
data.value: Topic with name {0} successfully created, let`s add some questions. Do you want to add question to topic?

data.name: TitleTextThankYou
data.value: Thank you for making us better!

data.name: CreatorCancelledMeeting
TitleTextCantApproveTopic
data.value: Unfortunately we can`t approve topic ({0}), please try different one.

data.name: SignUpSuccess
data.value:
So, how exactly does it all work? It’s not all rocket science! All you need to do is join any meeting you like. If there’s nothing that catches your eye, you can always create your own meeting by choosing language, language level, date, time, meeting topic and number of people. See, you can be your own boss here 😎
We'll notify you if anybody creates meeting with same language and language level you've specified in the previous steps, but you can always change your notification preferences by visiting Settings page.
Happy practicing!😊

data.name: TitleTextNotificationCreated
data.value: Notification has created, we will definitely notify you if there is a suitable meeting! Would you like to create another notification?

data.name: TitleTextNotificationAlreadyExist
data.value: Notification with the same parameters already exist. Would you like to create another notification?

data.name: TitleTextNotificationPreferences
data.value: Choose one or more levels you practice, we will notify you when someone creates meeting for the specified levels

data.name: SelectLanguageNotificationPreferences
data.value: Choose the language you practice, we will notify you when someone creates a meeting in the specified language

data.name: NoFreePlacesWhenJoin
data.value: ❌You can`t join the meeting because there are not free places❌ You are always able to create your own meeting.

data.name: CantJoinMeetingIsInProgressOrEnded
data.value: Unfortunately you can`t join meeting as it`s already in progress or ended.

data.name: MessageTextSetLocation
data.value:
In order for me to be able to show meetings date and time in your time zone, I need to know your location.
You can set location by executing /setlocation command.

data.name: CouldNotCreateGoogleMeetMeeting
data.value: Could not create google meet meeting. Try again later or try to re-authorize with Google

data.name: TitleTextMeetingNotificationTurnedOff

data.name: TitleTextTurnOnNotificationQuestion

data.name: JoinMeetingCanceled

data.name: MeetingAlreadyBegun
data.value: You cannot leave the meeting that has already begun or ended.

data.name: RequestLimitMessage
data.value: Please wait, we are still handling your request.

data.name: TitleTextNotificationByPreference
data.value: A meeting by your preferences has appeared.

data.name: TitleTextMeetingReminder
data.value: Friendly reminder, your meeting #{{ meeting.id }} starts soon at {{ meeting.time }}.

data.name: TitleTextNobodyJoinsMeeting
data.value: Friendly reminder, unfortunately no one joined meeting #{{meeting.id}} yet, which will start at {{meeting.time}}.

data.value: In order to create offline meeting, please use Telegram Web App, standard Telegram Bot doesn't allow to enter all required info.
